h2_title: Where to Find the Apramana Bat
h3_title: Apramana Bat Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: Zhu Bajie can be a big boon for this fight, as the bat will largely focus on you with its ranged flying attacks, and as it drops to the ground between attacks, the little pig guy will be right there waiting for score some free hits. Don't be afraid to fall back either and wait for him to heal you as needed, but otherwise you can bait out several of the Apramana Bats ranged attacks without having to worry too much about closing the distance until the opportunity presents itself, allowing your sidekick to chip away in the meantime.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Apramana_Bat.md', within the main section titled 'Apramana Bat', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Apramana Bat' and the sub-subsection 'Apramana Bat Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Zhu Bajie can be a big boon for this fight, as the bat will largely focus on you with its ranged flying attacks, and as it drops to the ground between attacks, the little pig guy will be right there waiting for score some free hits. Don't be afraid to fall back either and wait for him to heal you as needed, but otherwise you can bait out several of the Apramana Bats ranged attacks without having to worry too much about closing the distance until the opportunity presents itself, allowing your sidekick to chip away in the meantime.
